properties.name: Current Cuisine
properties.description: Posted by Linworth03237 xenia ave, yellow springs, ohgreat for take out fancy stuff!

properties.name: Dark Star Books and Comics
properties.description: Posted by Linworth03237 xenia ave, yellow springs, ohbest book store ever (except for karen witcliff books in clintonville, but that\'s another story)! history, academics, classics, comics, whatever!

properties.name: Linworth Alternative Program
properties.description: Posted by Linworth032075 dublin-granville rd, worthington, ohthis is my high school, or one of them; it was an experimental and experiential-based learnin program and it helped make me the person i am today! please visit their website!

properties.name: Peachs Grill
properties.description: Posted by Linworth03104 xenia ave, yellow springs, ohgood shows and drinks! food\'s not bad either: try the spinach artichoke dip!

properties.name: Sunrise Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Linworth03 259 xenia ave, yellow springs, ohhands down best food in town

properties.name: Wright State University
properties.description: Posted by Linworth033640 colonel glenn hwy, fairborn, ohstudying to get a B.A. in music, hopefully will graduate in winter \'08

properties.name: antioch theatre
properties.description: Posted by Linworth03 795 livermore st, yellow springs, ohreally it\'s on corry street, but this is antioch college\'s property. anyways i volunteer for the yellow springs kids playhouse, which does its productions in the theatre and in the ampitheatre in the back. such a cool building! it used to be where they smelted bronze or something! crazy industrial era!

properties.name: aunt connie's
properties.description: Posted by Linworth03north lawrence, ohduring my childhood i spent a lot of time at my aunt connie\'s house during the summers helping in her craft workshop and around the farm.

properties.name: blue's house
properties.description: Posted by Linworth03millfield ave and main st, westerville, ohthis is where my boyfriend lives; i\'ve stayed there a handful of times....

properties.name: current home
properties.description: Posted by Linworth03dayton st and high st, yellow springs. ohthis is where i live now and commute to school from. i work at a local cafe on the weekends.

properties.name: dorm
properties.description: Posted by Linworth031245 springwood ln, fairborn, ohi lived in jacob dorm in the woods during my freshman year at wright state.

properties.name: evening street elementary
properties.description: Posted by Linworth03885 evening st, worthington, ohnot much to say, just that, unlike most people i\'ve talked to, elementary school were the hardest social years of grade school.

properties.name: glen helen nature preserve
properties.description: Posted by Linworth03 405 corry st, yellow springs, ohvery special nature preserve, for more reasons than the official website will tell you....

properties.name: home sweet home
properties.description: Posted by Linworth03oxford street and stafford ave, worthington, ohthis is where i grew up, i visit my folks regularly

properties.name: john bryan state park
properties.description: Posted by Linworth03 3790 state route 370, yellow springs, ohioall sorts of fun stuff!

properties.name: kilbourne middle school
properties.description: Posted by Linworth03 50 e dublin-granville rd, worthington, ohreally cool old building! oh by the way this was my middle school

properties.name: thomas worthington high school
properties.description: Posted by Linworth03 300 w dublin-graniville rd, worthington, ohmy other high school. i took french, theatre, stagecraft, and all sorts of music classes here that weren\'t offered at little old linworth. didn\'t much care for the big school attitude; much too sterile

properties.name: walnut house in yellow springs
properties.description: Posted by Linworth03s walnut st and dayton st, yellow springs, ohi lived here for a little over a year. folks, always make sure you sign a lease, or else your land lady might unexpectedly sell the house and put you on the street!

properties.name: yellow springs library
properties.description: Posted by Linworth03415 xenia ave, yellow springs, ohyeah, books!
